mapper.select: SELECT APP.INSTANCE_TYPE, APP.CORES, ROUND(APP.RAM, 4) AS RAM, APP.PER_HOUR FROM TASM_AZR_VM_PRICING_L APP WHERE APP.SERIES = ( SELECT SERIES FROM TASM_AZR_VM_PRICING_L WHERE INSTANCE_TYPE = #{instanceType} LIMIT 1 ) AND APP.REGION = #{region} AND APP.OS = #{osType} AND APP.PER_HOUR IS NOT NULL AND APP.CORES > ( SELECT CORES FROM TASM_AZR_VM_PRICING_L WHERE INSTANCE_TYPE = #{instanceType} LIMIT 1 ) AND APP.RAM > ( SELECT RAM FROM TASM_AZR_VM_PRICING_L WHERE INSTANCE_TYPE = #{instanceType} LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY APP.PER_HOUR * 1.0 LIMIT 1
